name: Polygon Dodge
description:
You are the blue rectangle and polygons are coming out of nowhere trying to hurt you!

Dodge as many polygons as you can with your limited 5 lives!

Compete with your siblings/friends!

|Controls|
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to shoot
|Objective|
  • Dodge as many polygon as you can!
